Class SwingUIThreadManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.core.threading.AbstractUIThreadManager

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ThreadingHandler, UIThreadManager

    public class SwingUIThreadManager
extends AbstractUIThreadManager
    Executes code using SwingUtilities.

    Andres Almiray
